page.title: 18Appleyards Garage
page.content: Appleyards Garage is one of the two main garages in Linlithgow the other being Jet Garage.Both are situated at the West End of Linlithgow near each other on opposite sides of the road on the main road to Falkirk. When we interviewed Mr Johnston at Appleyards Garage he told us that 60% of vehicles that use the garage are private cars.He said that the busiest time of the day in his garage is between 9.00am and 11.00am. Before the garage was modernised the pumps were worked by the mechanics but now the six pumps are self service. Appleyards Garage has a showroom and they have made a lot of money.We were lucky enough to get a run back to school in a new Austin Montego.It was computerised and the speed guage went up in digital numbers.The ride was great!
